title: Click Add Consideration and choose Player to be Named Later
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on a prelim trade
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks ADD consideration for 2nd ORG in trade
AND selects Player to be Named later
custom_expected: THEN selected consideration is added to the trade

title: Fill in required fields and click Submit
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on a prelim trade
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills in all required fields
AND clicks submit
custom_expected: THEN the trade is updated to submitted status

title: Submit to BOC
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on a pending trade
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks submit to  BOC
custom_expected: THEn the trade is updated to submitted to BOC status

title: Approve and Reverse
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on a submitted to BOC trade
AND has approved the trade
custom_expected: THEN the trade updates to reversed
